name: unfruitful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not producing any good or valuable result: The two sides have been involved in lengthy - but so far unfruitful - negotiations. Synonyms
fruitless
unproductive
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
not producing a desired resultunsuccessfulOur attempts to change the law were unsuccessful.failedThe company went bankrupt pouring money into yet another failed product.badSales have been really bad this quarter.fruitlessAll our pleas that she remain in university were fruitless - she left anyway.unfruitfulThe negotiations were unfruitful.
See more results »
not producing fruit or crops: If allowed to spread too quickly, the vine will end up with a lot of bare, unfruitful wood. In the new colony the soil was unfruitful and the settlers knew nothing of farming. Synonym
barren
not producing children: They had both agreed to adopt after two years of unfruitful marriage. Synonym
barren
More examplesFewer examplesOur appeals to the council enforcement officers have been unfruitful. The search warrant was very unfruitful because we got there too late.Although now 78 years old, he has not given up his unfruitful political struggle.The decision can be appealed, but typically such appeals are long and unfruitful endeavours. I see little benefit in expending our resources and energies in unfruitful expeditions.
